short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful tool for gathering and analyzing your online store statistics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

GOOPSS: Online store Recommendations is your essential tool for enhancing and optimizing your online store’s performance. With a simple click of a button, this extension gathers and analyzes critical store statistics, providing you with actionable recommendations to boost your sales and visibility.

Features:

	•	Comprehensive Data Analysis: Instantly gather key statistics from your store, including product listings, sales figures, and customer interactions.
	•	Actionable Recommendations: Receive tailored advice on how to improve your store’s performance based on the latest data.
	•	User-Friendly Interface: Easy to use with a clean and intuitive interface that makes data analysis simple and accessible.
	•	Privacy Focused: We only collect non-personalized store stats to provide you with the best recommendations while respecting your privacy.

How It Works:

	1.	Install the Extension: Add GOOPSS: Recommendations to your Chrome browser.
	2.	Activate with a Click: Open your store and click on the extension icon to start gathering data.
	3.	Get Recommendations: go to app.goopss.com and View detailed analytics and actionable recommendations to optimize your store’s performance.
	4.	Implement Changes: Follow the provided advice to enhance your listings, improve customer engagement, and boost sales.
